basics.name: Feighen Oosterbroek
basics.label: Senior Laravel Engineer at Adeva
basics.summary:
Results-driven professional with experience leading web and mobile development, architecting scalable APIs, integrating DevOps workflows, and driving Agile teams to deliver enterprise-grade solutions using Laravel and modern frameworks.

Proven expertise in delivering scalable backend systems using modern PHP frameworks, with a strong focus on Laravel, Vue.js, and PostgreSQL. Demonstrated success in architecting modular Laravel APIs for high-availability, multi-frontend platforms and deploying containerized applications to Kubernetes clusters via GitLab CI/CD. Adept at managing CI/CD pipelines, automating development workflows, and driving performance optimization across distributed systems. Skilled in maintaining and modernizing legacy systems, enforcing TDD with PHPUnit, and applying BDD using Behat. Strong background in unit/integration testing, code quality enforcement, and DevOps practices.

work.name: Adeva
work.summary: Spearheaded end-to-end development of the ASHRC eCRF platform at IQVIA, leading a team through delivery of a Vue 2-based single-page application built within a unified Laravel monolith. Direct Agile workflows, facilitating sprint planning, backlog prioritisation, and peer code reviews to uphold high-quality engineering standards. Assume leadership responsibilities in a first-time team lead capacity, mentoring developers, coordinating cross-functional efforts, and driving timely project delivery.

work.name: Quidco
work.summary: Delivered high-priority business-as-usual (BAU) tasks as part of a specialised “Fire Team”, rapidly addressing non-project-specific issues based on evolving business needs via a Kanban board in Jira. Debugged, triaged, and resolved critical production issues across multiple codebases, significantly improving application stability and response times. Developed and maintained functionality in legacy and modern codebases using Vanilla PHP, Laravel 5.1/5.5, and AngularJS (v1 & v2), ensuring cross-platform consistency. Utilised Node.js, Postman, and CLI-based tools (e.g., curl) for API testing, endpoint verification, and rapid issue diagnosis in production environments.

work.name: RM Web Studio
work.summary: Created and executed unit test coverage with PHPUnit, enforcing test-first principles and reducing defect rates in production. Designed and maintained Postman API test collections, ensuring they remained synchronised with evolving endpoints and codebase changes. Advanced personal expertise in BDD by independently learning and applying Behat within collaborative Agile development environments.

work.name: Barloworld Transport (Pty) Ltd
work.summary: Managed a small cross-functional team comprising in-house developers, QA analysts, and third-party suppliers, ensuring timely delivery of development and support activities. Oversaw operating system patching cycles across critical systems, coordinating with infrastructure teams to minimise downtime and maintain compliance.

work.name: Manline
work.summary: Developed revenue reporting dashboards using Vanilla PHP 7, supplying real-time financial metrics to a Flash-based frontend to support budget tracking and executive decision-making. Administered Zimbra email server and managed database backups, OS patching, and disaster recovery protocols to ensure operational continuity and data integrity.

work.name: noon day sun programming
work.summary: Designed and deployed custom websites using Zend Framework 1 MVC, delivering full-stack functionality for small business clients across billing, user interaction, and data integration. Managed all aspects of technical delivery and client engagement, providing tailored software solutions and ensuring on-time, high-quality deployments.
